description: Grey plain weave cotton cloth (white warp, grey weft) with noncontinuous light brown and looped white supplementary wefts which enhance the floral pattern of brown outlined leaves and white vines. Natural white plain weave cotton cloth with noncontinuous white and looped tan-colored supplementary wefts which enhance the floral pattern of light leaves and darker vines. vanilla
